text:
I want to know how #Russia is treating the #CoronaVirus, #COVID19 #CoronaVirusRussia - given that #chloroquine can be purchased over the counter in Russia, #Arbidol #Umifenovir, are people self-treating with this? 
Do they have other treatments? 
What are other countries doing? https://t.co/aV89EUpptR https://t.co/5KO480tZJC
